Dress me
Visual change equip â€º The .dressme command is a brand new system that gives you the chance to change your armors, weapon, shield or suit texture to look like a different grade (D-C-B-A-S & S84 texture).
*WARNING:* Full body armors can use ONLY full body armor textures After you purchase the dressme, these features are saved to your character and restored when you log back in-game.
